name: Wrong Horizon
description:
Wrong Horizon is a fan game of Vlambeer's Luftrauser. I made it out of excitement for their upcoming  game Luftrausers.

The art is done in Hexels. The sound effects are made from http://www.bfxr.net/

Music by Mike Woodley aka DropVox. Tumblr. Soundcloud.

Thanks for playing!
